languageKey.label: Test
Select the type of the publication
Enter the name in the format SURNAME, GIVEN_NAME1 GIVEN_NAME2 (e.g. van Halen, Edward Alex) or GIVEN_NAME SURNAME, if only one of each (e.g. Albert Einstein)
Enter a list of co-authors (including coresponding author), separated by ; e.g. Einstein, Albert; van Halen, Edward
